data.title: Dr. Thomas Horan
data.meta_description: Dr. Thomas Horan is a Professor and Pre-Law Advisor in the School of Humanities and Social Sciences at The Citadel.
data.meta_site_name: Department of English, Fine Arts & Communications
data.text:
Professor and Pre-Law Advisor

Tom Horan received his Ph.D. from The University of North Carolina-Chapel Hill, his J.D. from Cornell University, and his A.B. from Harvard University. He specializes in twentieth-century British literature (especially political dystopian fiction) and modern drama.

Dr. Horan is The Citadelâ€™s Pre-Law Advisor. Click Here to be added to the Pre-Law Email Distribution List for updates and information.

Research Interests: 20th-Century Dystopian and Utopian Literature, 20th-Century British Fiction and Modern and Contemporary Drama.

Degrees
